Class ResMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppfold.algo.ResMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ResMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains matrices for storing inside, outside, expectation variables, and methods for operations with them.
    Author:
    Z.Sukosd
    See Also:
    JobResults, CYKJob, Serialized Form
